highlight: 2020 saw an increase in\nnumber of children without DTP1\nby over 3 million worldwide.
2021 saw another\nincrease by over\n2 million worldwide

Until 2019 South East Asia and E. Mediterranean region had
similar number of unvaccinated children. However, S.E Asia
had a lower percentage due to its larger population. This
trend reversed during and after pandemic. Now, S.E Asia has
higher number as well as higher percentage.
E. Mediterranean region saw a slight impact in 2020\nand it also recovered a bit by 2021.
Africa had much lower coverage % even before\nand it got worse during the pandemic.
